column1: A celebration of his life will be held at Wing Mortuary
column3: Utah at 10:00 a.m. on Saturday 13th of June. Friends and family can visit at 9:00 a.m. prior to the service. Graveside services will be held at 4:00 p.m. at Lyman Cemetery
column4: Lyman Utah. There will also be a visitation with the family and friends at Wing Mortuary on Friday evening from 7:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
